00007         function setup()
00008         {
00009                 $('#f_q').keyup(function(e)
00010                 {
00011                         reload_blocked_ips();
00012                 });
00013                 $('#queries-frm').submit(function(e)
00014                 {
00015                         return reload_blocked_ips();

00017                 $('#f_block').click(function(e)
00018                 {
00019                         var ip = prompt('<?php echo s(l('Enter the IP address')); ?>', '');
00020                         if (ip.match(/^(\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}$/))
00021                         {
00022                                 Servo.load({url:"/meta/block_ip.html?ip="+encodeURIComponent(ip),oncomplete:function(resp){alert(resp);reload_blocked_ips()}});
00023                         }
00024                 });
00025                 reload_blocked_ips();
00026         }
00027         
00028         function reload_blocked_ips()
00029         {
00030                 return !Servo.load(
00031                         {
00032                                 url: '<?php print $this->url_to(array('action' => 'blocked_ips_list')); ?>?q='
00033                                         + encodeURIComponent($('#f_q').val()),
00034                                 target: document.getElementById('blocked-ips-list-container')
00035                         });
00036         }
00037         
00038         function unblock(sender)
00039         {
00040                 var id = sender.id.substring(3);
00041                 if (confirm("<?php echo h(l('Sbloccare questo indirizzo IP?')); ?>"))
00042                 {
00043                         Servo.load({
00044                                 url: "/meta/unblock_ip/" + encodeURIComponent(id),
00045                                 oncomplete: reload_blocked_ips});
00046                 }
00047         }
